纏.definition: to wind around; to wrap round; to coil; tangle; to involve; to bother; to annoy

纏夾.definition: to annoy; to bother; to harass

纏夾不清.definition: to muddle things together (idiom); to bother sb with annoying muddle-headed talk

纏夾二先生.definition: annoying muddle-headed person who gabbles unintelligibly

纏結.definition: to coil around; knot; to entangle

纏絡.definition: to wind around; to twist and turn (of road or river)

纏綿不已.definition: to cling without letting go; to pester without end; to cling lovingly to each other

纏綿悱惻.definition: (of a person) sad beyond words (idiom); (of music, literature etc) poignant; very sentimental

纏繞.definition: twisting; to twine; to wind; to pester; to bother

纏身.definition: (of an illness, debt etc) to plague one; to bog one down; to preoccupy one

纏頭.definition: embroidered headband used as decoration by actors or in Hui ethnic group; to reward an actor with brocade headband
